summary: They did in 2 of the 3 debates.

statements.quote: So I was very proud of the policies we put forth. You know, I kept waiting for the moment -- I, you know, I've watched a million presidential debates in my life and I was waiting for the moment when one of the people asking the questions would have said, well, so exactly how are you going to create more jobs, right? ... I thought at some moment that would happen.

name: debate moderators didn't ask Trump how he planned to create jobs
